name: code_writer
description: This tool is used to write code for a file of a project, this tool will write any code that is needed, but we need to stick to python flask framework with jinja2 templating engine and bootstrap for styling

file_path.description: The path to the file where the code should be written to

code.description: The code to be written in the file

language.description: The language of the code to be written the languages allowed are python java script, html and custom css if needed
